item.description:
We need to be always ready for sudden occurrences. I need to be internally strong and stable so that when things happen suddenly I can face them with fortitude and clarity and respond with grace. President Obama referred to the gathering clouds and raging storms of our times in his inaugural address. He called upon us as a country to remind ourselves of our history of strength and victory. We as individuals must also do that -- remember the times of our resilience and call upon that for the times ahead.

Worry and resistance are obstacles to my progress. Worrying about how everything will get done or whether I am capable of doing it limits my ability to respond to challenges considerably. Time spent fretting and procrastinating is a major drain on my energy. The more willing I am to respond positively and transform the challenge to see the opportunity, the more my capacity will grow...
item.how_to_find_us: Please go to Winchell room to find us

group.name: Owning Greatness Through Raja Yoga Manchester Meetup Group

item.name: SUDDENLY . . . EMBRACING CHANGE
